hints.content:
We can solve this problem in two ways:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{17} \text{ fish}\\
+& \underline{\blue{?} \text{ cats}}\\
=&\pink{19} \text{ pets in total}\end{align}$

Or:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\pink{19} \text{ pets in total}\\
-& \underline{\green{17} \text{ fish}}\\
=&\blue{?} \text{ cats}\end{align}$

question.content:
I have $19$ pets. $17$ of them are fish and the rest are cats.

**How many cats do I have? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] cats
